channel.title: Legistar on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: The state of the city, Ann Arbor, fall 2015
item.description: A perspective on Ann Arbor area local government, as seen from fall 2015. The top level view is that local units of government are struggling with their technology investments, having a difficult time keeping them working, and are unwilling or unable to commit to any sort of “open data” initiatives as a result of their difficulties with basic operations. Some examples will illustrate. The City of Ann Arbor keeps track of a wide range of planning and permit documents through a vendor system called eTrakit.
